title: Where was the Jiffy Grill located?
text:
Reporter Mike Voorheis answered your question about the Jiffy Grill:



Where was the Jiffy Grill located?



The Jiffy Grill was located at 306 N. Front St., now the site of a
Subway.



I got my answer from this archived ñFemale Help Wantedî ad in the
Morning Star: 

http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=51VgAAAAIBAJ&sjid=snENAAAAIBAJ&pg=767,2267609&dq=jiffy-grill&hl=en
